segments.text: Are these the clothes you want to have washed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . When can I get them back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if they are collected right now , you can get them back tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . By the way , please have that suit dry cleaned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Please fill in the form first .
segments.speaker: S1
